commands.name: help
commands.description: Displays all commands available in the bot

commands.name: chop
commands.description: Chop wood. Only if you have an axe

commands.name: dig
commands.description: Have a dig around. Only if you have a shovel

commands.name: mine
commands.description: Go on a mining trip. Only if you have a pickaxe

commands.name: fish
commands.description: Go fishing. Only if you have a fishing rod

commands.name: hunt
commands.description: Go on a hunting trip. Only if you have a weapon

commands.name: inv
commands.description: Shows the items in your inventory

commands.name: addfuel <item name>
commands.description: Add fuel to your fuel stockpile (required to smelt items)

commands.name: recipes
commands.description: Shows all the items that can be crafted in the game

commands.name: myrecipes
commands.description: Shows all items that you have the items to craft

commands.name: stats
commands.description: Shows key statistics about a player
